extensionName.message: YouTube Multilingual Title Quick Add Tool

extensionDescription.message: One-click automatic addition of multilingual translations with custom language list memory and UI optimization.

languageNameWarning.message: Language names must exactly match the names in YouTube's add language options, including all symbols and parentheses!

languageNameExample.message: For example: use "English" instead of "english" or "English (US)"

formatDescription.message: Use | to separate language, title, and description. Description is optional

selectLanguages.message: Select languages and expand to fill in titles and descriptions

resetConfirm.message: Reset to default languages? Custom languages will be lost.

fillTitleOrUncheck.message: Please fill in the title for "{0}" or uncheck it.

bulkCommandParseError.message:
Bulk command parse error: {0}

Correct format: {{language|title|description},{language|title|description}}

languageProcessingFailed.message:
The following languages failed to process: {0}

Please check if the language names exactly match YouTube's "Add Language" options. You can open YouTube's "Add Language" dropdown to verify the correct names.
